section.heading: Issuance of Washington Wizards motor vehicle identification tags.

para.text: The Mayor may design and make available for issue one or more Washington Wizards motor vehicle identification tags to demonstrate support for the Washington Wizards basketball team.

A resident ordering a Washington Wizards tag shall pay a one-time application fee and a display fee each year thereafter. The application fee shall be $25, and the display fee shall be $20, or such other amounts as the Mayor may establish by rule.
The application and annual display fees shall be deposited into the General Fund of the District of Columbia.

annotations.annotation: Aug. 17, 1937, 50 Stat. 680, ch. 690, title IV, ยง 2m
